com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class TrackingSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.TrackingSettings
  • Deprecated. 
    use location layer plugin from https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-plugins-android/tree/master/plugins/locationlayer instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class TrackingSettings
extends Object
    Settings for the user location and bearing tracking of a MapboxMap.

    • Method Detail

      • setMyLocationTrackingMode

        @UiThread
public void setMyLocationTrackingMode(int myLocationTrackingMode)
        Deprecated. 

        Set the current my location tracking mode.

        Will enable my location if not active.

        See MyLocationTracking for different values.
        Parameters:
        myLocationTrackingMode - The location tracking mode to be used.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if no suitable permission is present
        See Also:
        MyLocationTracking

      • getMyLocationTrackingMode

        @UiThread
public int getMyLocationTrackingMode()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the current user location tracking mode.
        Returns:
        The current user location tracking mode. One of the values from MyLocationTracking.Mode.
        See Also:
        MyLocationTracking.Mode

      • setMyBearingTrackingMode

        @UiThread
public void setMyBearingTrackingMode(int myBearingTrackingMode)
        Deprecated. 

        Set the current my bearing tracking mode.

        Shows the direction the user is heading.

        When location tracking is disabled the direction of MyLocationView is rotated. When location tracking is enabled the MapView is rotated based on the bearing value.

        See MyBearingTracking for different values.
        Parameters:
        myBearingTrackingMode - The bearing tracking mode to be used.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if no suitable permission is present
        See Also:
        MyBearingTracking

      • getMyBearingTrackingMode

        @UiThread
public int getMyBearingTrackingMode()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the current user bearing tracking mode. See MyBearingTracking for possible return values.
        Returns:
        the current user bearing tracking mode.
        See Also:
        MyBearingTracking

      • isAllDismissTrackingOnGesture

        public boolean isAllDismissTrackingOnGesture()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns if all tracking modes will be dismissed when a gesture occurs.
        Returns:
        True to indicate that location and bearing tracking will be dismissed.

      • setDismissAllTrackingOnGesture

        public void setDismissAllTrackingOnGesture(boolean dismissTrackingOnGesture)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the dismissal of the tracking modes if a gesture occurs.
        Parameters:
        dismissTrackingOnGesture - True to dismiss all the tracking modes.

      • setDismissLocationTrackingOnGesture

        public void setDismissLocationTrackingOnGesture(boolean dismissLocationTrackingOnGesture)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the dismissal of the tracking modes if a gesture occurs.
        Parameters:
        dismissLocationTrackingOnGesture - True to dismiss the location tracking mode.

        Deprecated. 
        Returns whether location change animation is applied for MyLocationTracking.TRACKING_FOLLOW.
        Returns:
        True if animation is applied, false otherwise.
